item.title: getting file out of fetch response
item.description: For an endpoint that returns a file via fetch, the file can be accessed by: 1 2 const res = await fetch(); const blob = await res.

item.title: mongodb unauthorized error
item.description: 1 MongoError: (Unauthorized) not authorized on admin to execute command If this error comes up when working with MongoDB, it could be that there are multiple databases in the mongodb instance.

item.title: sending FormData to the backend
item.description: When forms have numeric or boolean data, they will be sent as strings to the backend. Just be aware that this is happening to do some work to turn them into the proper datatypes.

item.title: call createApi endpoints outside react components
item.description: [[dev_notes/rtk-q createApi|rtk-q createApi]] endpoints can be called from outside react components by dispatching the returned [[redux thunk]] from the endpoints’ .

item.title: firebase auth
item.description: Firebase auth is free for without limit on the number of users. It could be a great option to use for new projects.

item.title: rtk query
item.description: docs RTK Query is a powerful data fetching and caching tool. It is designed to simplify common cases for loading data in a web application, eliminating the need to hand-write data fetching & caching logic yourself.

item.title: rtk-q createApi
item.description: docs One of [[dev_notes/rtk query|rtk query]]’s api that help with keeping code that interact with an backend api with a common baseUrl.

item.title: unstyled components

item.title: zod
item.description: docs Zod is a TypeScript-first schema declaration and validation library. I’m using the term “schema” to broadly refer to any data type, from a simple string to a complex nested object.

item.title: sveltekit-on-cloudfunctions
item.description: What about firebase-adapter-node? I was using this adapter for my project before sveltekit@1.0.0 came out. I think it works fine, but the problem is that it is always behind the current version of sveltekit.
